'''Bathysmal Vishap Experimental Records''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained through completing the {{Quest|Tricolor File}}. At the end of the {{Quest|Collection of Dragons and Snakes}}, it is handed in and can be interacted with after the quest completes to obtain an archive entry for [[The Byakuyakoku Collection]].
